in.teramatrix.flint.driver.controller

Class StatusHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.controller.StatusHandler

  • public class StatusHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    All the hardcoded stuff related to tickets/tasks or status will be written here. In future, only this file will be updated.
    Author:
    mohsin.khan
    Date:
    12/6/2016

      • getLastStatus

        public static int getLastStatus()
        This is for closed ticket.
        Returns:
        the status id of closed status

      • getIcon

        public static int getIcon(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - task status id from the notification json object
        Returns:
        icon resource id related to given status id

      • getFragment

        public static android.support.v4.app.Fragment getFragment(com.google.gson.JsonObject object)
        Here close fragment status id has been hardcoded that is 10 in this version. If task has been closed than this method will return CloseTicketFragment otherwise OpenTicketFragment
        Parameters:
        object - notification json object to read current status
        Returns:
        appropriate fragment to load

      • getStatus

        public static int getStatus(com.google.gson.JsonObject object)
        These are some checks applied on task status update activity. In this version.. User can not update status 1 and 2 because it is for "New" and "Assigned" respectively. User can not update status 3 twice because it is for "Accepted" User can update any status more than 3 multiple times
        Parameters:
        object - an object that holds current status of the task
        Returns:
        on which item of status list, a user can click
